name: Pacific War
description:
Get ready pilot - a Japanese Task Force is heading our way.  We have an opportunity to strike first and sink their ships.  You will pilot a Dauntless F4 armed with machine guns and bombs.  Your objective is to sink as many of the enemy ships as possible.  You have enough fuel for "5" passes and you will be limited to the number of available bombs based upon the difficulty level you choose.  You can score points by shooting down enemy planes and sinking enemy ships - you lose Health by being hit by enemy fire and FLAK .  Go in low and make those bombs count.  You can earn a Gold, Silver or Bronze medal based upon your performance.  Your last five scores are saved - can you beat your last highest?

Good Luck Pilot
